name: Burning Embers
description: Slash an enemy with flame, dealing 1161 Flame Damage and an additional 2315 Flame Damage over 10 seconds.   You heal for 100% of the damage done with this ability.    Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Burning status effect.
effectLines: Heals you for a percentage of damage done.
coefDescription: Slash an enemy with flame, dealing $1 Flame Damage and an additional $2 Flame Damage over 10 seconds.   You heal for 100% of the damage done with this ability.    Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Burning status effect.
rawDescription:
Slash an enemy with flame, dealing <<1>> and an additional <<2>> over <<3>>. 

You heal for <<4>>% of the damage done with this ability. 

Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Burning status effect.
